## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G06730](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G06730)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PNK1</u>
- **Gene Name:** PLASTID NUCLEOSIDE KINASE 1
- **Description:**   pfkB-like carbohydrate kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2033138
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
